# Hanzo Network

> Decentralized AI compute network and infrastructure.

## About
Hanzo Network is a decentralized AI compute network providing distributed GPU clusters, model training infrastructure, and inference serving at scale. It enables distributed AI workloads across a global network of compute providers, offering cost-effective access to high-performance GPUs for training, fine-tuning, and serving AI models.

## Key Features
- Decentralized GPU compute marketplace
- Distributed training across multiple nodes
- Model serving and inference at scale
- Global network of compute providers
- Automatic load balancing and failover
- Cost-effective GPU access (A100, H100, H200)
- Support for PyTorch, JAX, and custom frameworks
- Encrypted data transfer and model privacy
- Pay-per-use pricing with no lock-in
- Integration with Hanzo AI platform
